Thanks for the invite to the show @justinbieber Fui a ver el show y termine arriba del escenario 😂😂 #Despacito #DespacitoRemix #VersionImprovisada #Choliseo A post shared by Luis Fonsi (@luisfonsi) on Apr 18, 2017 at 8:37pm PDT

Los Domingos son pa' esto!! #FamilyFirst A post shared by Luis Fonsi (@luisfonsi) on Mar 26, 2017 at 2:00pm PDT

Daddy - Yankee - Magic - Part - Ideas

(Excerpt) Read more at: E! Online

Wake Up To Breaking News! SUBMIT

But even then, Fonsi felt that something was missing. That's when the thought of having someone featured on the track was born. And who did they call? Daddy Yankee, of course.As Fonsi explains, Yankee was more than just a feature, and he brought a lot to the table."Daddy Yankee added his magic to it. The rap part was all him. He had some amazing ideas for the song as well," the star says. "His featuring was a special on because it was so much more than him just rapping his verse. He really...
title: Luis Fonsi Reveals Secrets Behind "Despacito" and That Surprise Justin Bieber Remix
